Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
To get started:

1. Sign up / sign in AIHeat App
Download and install AIHeat App (search AIHeat in App Store or Google Play) and sign up an other region account.

2. Add device
Make sure the Wi-Fi device has been correctly configured in AIHeat App and you can remotely control/access it via external networks (3G/4G). 

3. Enable skill
In Alexa App, search and enable the skill “HVAC-H-US”. Then follow the wizard to link your Amazon account to AIHeat account. 
After account linking process is completed, discover devices in Alexa App or say “Alexa, discover devices” and make sure the device is listed and displayed as the same name in AIHeat App.
NOTE: You need to discover devices again in Alexa App if one of the following changes were made:
Changed device name,
Added or deleted device,
The device has been reset.

4. Control device by voice
Now you can say to Alexa for voice control.
When using the skill, you will need to specify by name which device to use. 
Troubleshooting:
If Alexa returns voice the device isn’t responding, there might be because the device is offline. Please try to access the device in AIHeat. If the App shows “Device is offline”, please check your network connection until you can access the device in app.
